data.name: Moonshot - The Great Espionage Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Why don't you listen to the official soundtrack while you're not playing Moonshot - The Great Espionage? Experience the full sound diversity of the 60s now.

The music style possibilities in a stealth puzzle platformer game set in the 1960's space race are abundant and SpaceCastle's soundtrack for Moonshot - The Great Espionage succeeds in delivering a variety of organic, jazzy and momentous tracks that establish a strong vibe for the player. The realism of the drum writing combined with live tracking and clean orchestral arrangements give the Moonshot OST a true sense of authenticity and immersion that will keep the player focused on completing the mission.

Composed by Nathaniel Marshall, also known as SpaceCastle.

All tracks are available as MP3.

data.short_description: The original Moonshot - The Soundtrack experience. All the tracks from the game Moonshot - The Great Espionage composed by Nathaniel Marshall a.k.a. SpaceCastle.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 155 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 155 MB available space
